DocAttribute.Name: FirstCoordinate
DocAttribute.Documentation: The first coordinate of the translation. Can be a length measure in case of map coordinates and angle in case of geographic reference systems.

DocAttribute.Name: SecondCoordinate
DocAttribute.Documentation: The second coordinate of translation. Can be a length measure in case of map coordinates and angle in case of geographic reference systems.

DocAttribute.Name: Height
DocAttribute.Documentation: Height above (positive) or below (negative) the coordinate surface.

DocWhereRule.Name: CoordinateType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Restricts the value type of _FirstCoordinate_ and _SecondCoordinate_ to _IfcLengthMeasure_ and _IfcPositivePlaneAngleMeasure_.
DocWhereRule.Expression: ('IFCMEASURERESOURCE.IFCLENGTHMEASURE' IN TYPEOF(FirstCoordinate) OR 'IFCMEASURERESOURCE.IFCPOSITIVEPLANEANGLEMEASURE' IN TYPEOF(FirstCoordinate)) AND ('IFCMEASURERESOURCE.IFCLENGTHMEASURE' IN TYPEOF(SecondCoordinate) OR 'IFCMEASURERESOURCE.IFCPOSITIVEPLANEANGLEMEASURE' IN TYPEOF(SecondCoordinate))
